name: Mathify
description:
Want to count faster? With this game, you can develop your math skills to a new level!

Just a few minutes every day and you will be able to count difficult expressions easily.
Peaceful music and beautiful UI will relax you and make you concentrated. 
Train your mental math skill in different modes. 

Features
  * 7 different modes
  * Raising difficulty over time
  * Peaceful piano music and sounds
  * Beautiful UI and animations
 
Become a better version of yourself. Learn how to count in a speed of light.
